brand_identity.name: TIVROX
brand_identity.tone: Professional, Scalable, Trustworthy, Innovative, Clean, High-Impact
brand_identity.core_philosophy: Digital Systems That Scale. No Clutter, Just Results.
brand_identity.visual_mood: Swiss Minimalist meets Modern SaaS. High contrast, purposeful white space, electric blue accents.

layout_strategy.container: container mx-auto px-4 md:px-6 lg:px-8 max-w-7xl

grids.bento_services: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 auto-rows-[300px]

glassmorphism.nav: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-slate-950/70 border-b border-slate-200/50 dark:border-slate-800/50
glassmorphism.card: backdrop-blur-lg bg-white/50 dark:bg-slate-900/50 border border-white/20 shadow-xl shadow-slate-200/20 dark:shadow-black/20

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-[1.02] active:scale-[0.98] shadow-lg shadow-primary/25
buttons.outline: border-2 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-transparent hover:bg-slate-100 dark:hover:bg-slate-800 text-slate-900 dark:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all

cards.service: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 p-8 transition-all duration-500 hover:border-primary/50 hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-primary/10
cards.feature: p-6 rounded-2xl bg-slate-50 dark:bg-slate-900/50 border border-transparent hover:border-slate-200 transition-colors

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-white px-4 text-base focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all outline-none

images.description: Two colleagues collaborating on a laptop, clean office environment
images.usage: About Us section or secondary hero

images.description: MacBook Pro with clean desk setup
Hand holding smartphone with health app interface
Video editing software interface on monitor
Hands drawing design sketches in sketchbook

rules: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text
Use semantic HTML (main, section, article, nav)
Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-primary)
Alt text mandatory for all images

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'lenis' for smooth scrolling: 'npm install lenis' or 'yarn add lenis'
Implement a 'Dark Mode' toggle in the navbar, default to 'System' or 'Light'
Use the provided image URLs exactly as mapped in 'visual_assets'
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use them only for subtle glows or text
Ensure the Admin Dashboard is protected and uses a clean, dense grid layout (unlike the marketing pages)
For the 'Why Choose Us' section, use a bento grid layout with mixed cell sizes
The Booking Form must have conditional logic (e.g., if 'Web Dev' selected, show 'Budget' field)
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Create depth.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
